headline: Kraft Heinz (KHC) Valuation Check As Expanded Kraft Hockeyville Program Draws Fresh Attention
summary: Kraft Heinz (KHC) is back in the headlines after expanding its Kraft Hockeyville program for its 20th anniversary. The move highlights community investment at a time when investors are reassessing the food group’s recent share price performance. See our latest analysis for Kraft Heinz. While Kraft Hockeyville puts the brand in a positive spotlight, Kraft Heinz’s recent market story has been tougher, with a 1 year total shareholder return of 15.4% decline and a 3 year total shareholder return...

headline: 3 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist in January 2026
summary: The Oracle of Omaha has retired, but you can still lean on his investing expertise with the three stocks currently held in the Berkshire Hathaway portfolio.
